name: Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure
description:
Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure is your gateway to the main game, offering an intriguing narrative that unfolds the story of the very first survivors who set foot on these enigmatic islands. As you navigate the intricacies of this captivating archipelago, you'll gradually unravel the essential skills of resource gathering, combat, and the art of survival.





The islands are full of things to explore. Enhance your character's strength by discovering loot and crafting weapons and gear.





Establish a community where various characters can join and assist you throughout your adventure.





Discover, craft, and conquer! Explore the island, gather resources, and defeat monsters to craft powerful weapons tailored to your style - customize your arsenal for victory!





On these islands filled with magic and mystery you’ll need to decide whether to rely on your physical skills or harness powerful magic in combat. And don't forget to brew potions for that extra edge in battle!

Key Features


  • Cozy mix of Sandbox & Survival Gameplay
  • Unique Magic World Full of Curiosities
  • The Opportunity To Build Your Own Town
